title: What is the best broadband plan? - Quora

response.answer_text: You can look for plans from your local cable operator, provided the network and speeds are good. I recently bought an Airtel broadband plan, and I love it. I took the 6 months plan for Delhi, and I got a handsome discount at the time of purchase. Plus, you will love the superfast speeds and the network is always on.

Depends on your city/area, i have used Act broadband in bengaluru which was great , i have used GBPS Fibre in Pune which is again good but has some limitations towards speed but has great consistency/ no packet drops
